h2_title: Red Boy Boss Fight and Guide
content: When his health reaches the halfway point, he'll launch himself up in the air. Shortly after, he'll create duplicates of himself that will appear all around him. These will launch themselves at you with their spears, resulting in an explosion. It'll start with one duplicate launching themselves at you, then two, and finally, a set of three will attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Boy.md', within the main section titled 'Red Boy', specifically from the subsection 'Red Boy Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When his health reaches the halfway point, he'll launch himself up in the air. Shortly after, he'll create duplicates of himself that will appear all around him. These will launch themselves at you with their spears, resulting in an explosion. It'll start with one duplicate launching themselves at you, then two, and finally, a set of three will attack.
